General.Name: Bank Saint-Petersburg Public Joint-Stock Company
General.Description: Bank Saint-Petersburg Public Joint Stock Company, a universal bank, provides a range of banking products and services to individuals and corporates in Russia. Its Corporate Banking division offers payment and settlement services; corporate lending; cash and settlement, business cards, acquiring, and payroll services for small and medium enterprises; and documentary operations and international trade finance services, as well as develops services for Exim companies. The company's Retail Banking division offers deposit services; payments and transfers solutions; self-employed programs; and mortgage and consumer loans, as well as issues bank cards and provides resident ID card services. Its Private Banking division provides financial and non-financial products and services to wealthy customers and their families. The company's Digital Banking division offers payment systems; online banking services for retail customers and corporate clients; and Internet banking services through i.bspb.ru, as well as mobile banking applications. It operates branches in North-West region of Russia, a branch in Moscow, and a branch in Novosibirsk; additional and operational offices and representative offices in Rostov- on-Don and Krasnodar; and ATMs and payment kiosks. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Saint Petersburg, Russia.
